TECHNICAL PROJECT

Weather Web App (Python/Flask, HTML, CSS)

  • Developed and deployed a full-stack weather application using Python with Flask, focused on integrating and parsing external data from the WeatherAPI.com service to display dynamic content.
  • Utilized the Flask backend to successfully handle user input and process JSON data, delivering current conditions, a 24-hour hourly forecast, and a 3-day forecast based on a user-submitted location.
  • Established a foundation in backend-to-frontend communication by implementing Flask routing to dynamically render HTML pages, presenting the information in a user-friendly interface.
